channel.title: CVE Feed for Simple Popup Newsletter -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Simple Popup Newsletter -- all products

item.title: CVE-2021-34658|2024-09-17T03:08:12.386Z -- simple%20popup%20newsletter -- simple%20popup%20newsletter
item.description: The Simple Popup Newsletter WordPress plugin is vulnerable to Reflected Cross-Site Scripting due to the use of $_SERVER['PHP_SELF'] in the ~/simple-popup-newsletter.php file which allows attackers to inject arbitrary web scripts, in versions up to and including 1.4.7.
